detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed funnel collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Blouse in crisp cotton poplin with a high, smocked stand-up collar, lace embroidery at the top and covered buttons at the back. V-shaped yoke with broderie anglaise at the front and an opening at the back. Long, wide raglan sleeves with inset trims and wide, smocked cuffs with embroidered lace trims. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
V-neck satin top with three narrow shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Short, voluminous dress in a cotton weave with a round neckline, wide armholes and long, super-wide sleeves with narrow, close-fitting cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a bell-shaped skirt with inset panels for added width and volume. Lined.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and long, wide raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Scalloped hem with broderie anglaise that is slightly shorter at the sides.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Slightly shorter, boxy-style sports top in soft, fast-drying jersey with short sleeves. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Track jacket in heavy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring and plastic cord stopper. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, discreet side pockets, ribbing at the cuffs, and narrow elastication at the back of the hem. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with reflective details. Wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zipped key pocket at the back, and a zip at the hems.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a soft brushed finish. Drawstring hood, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist, and cuffs with a press-stud fastening. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and slits in the sides.
Skirt in patterned, washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Double metal chain bracelet decorated with three gold-coloured plastic beads of different sizes.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in patterned, stretch organic cotton jersey with a stand-up collar, press-studs at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a double-layered, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Halterneck bralette in soft lace with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. No fasteners.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with buttons down the front and ribbed trims.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a two-way zip at the front, an outer compartment with a zip at the back, and two inner compartments. Adjustable waist strap with plastic fasteners. Lined. Size 5x15.5x26.5 cm.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2x-12xY), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Imitation leather trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front, padded top edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Satin hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Striped jumper in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool in a relaxed fit with long sleeves, a ribbed neckline and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, gently flared top in jersey crêpe with an opening and button at the top and a gathered, frill-trimmed neckline with narrow elastication.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems. Front pockets, flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs, and decorative pocket flaps at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with dolman sleeves.
Platform sandals with fabric straps, narrow elastication at the heels and covered soles. Platform front 1.5 cm. Covered heels 12 cm.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
Tube scarf in a soft textured knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 151 cm.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Metal rings in various designs, three with sparkly stones.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x16x24 cm.
V-neck top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester. Buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted cami tops in stretch jersey with a lace trim at the top, V-neck and integral bra with padded cups. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elastication at the hem.
Glittery Alice band with a matching wand. Alice band decorated with faceted plastic beads. Wand with a star and satin ribbons at the top.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a flounce at the top and a rounded hem. Sleeves with short slits and ties.

Jacket in corduroy with a faux shearling-lined collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides, and buttoned cuffs. Partly lined in faux shearling.

department_name: Sneakers big girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers with details in shimmering metallic imitation leather with a lightly padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top.
Ankle-length trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a high, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, zip at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Sandals in suede and sturdy woven fabric with straps that tie around the ankles and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length jersey dress with draped sides, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and gathers at one side.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Balconette bra in soft lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape, narrow detachable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long-sleeved jumpsuit in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a wrapover front with a hook-and-eye fastening. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt under the bust and straight, wide legs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Skinny-fit, ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Baby Exclusive. Trousers in double-weave, crinkled organic cotton with an elasticated waist, decorative buttons at the front, side pockets, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Jacket in soft pile with a jersey-lined hood, buttons down the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs.
Trainers with a hook and loop fastening at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist for a good fit over the tummy. Wide elastication at the waist and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake zipped front pockets.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. V-neck swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Deep V-neck at the back and a narrow, elastic belt that accentuates the waist. Lined.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and wide sides.
Loose-fitting jumper with low dropped shoulders in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish.
Shopper in transparent plastic with two round imitation leather handles at the top. Size 9.5x26x29.5 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
5-pocket low-rise shorts in washed denim with a zip fly and button and raw-edge hems with slits in the sides.
Straight-cut, oversized top in airy slub jersey made from a Tencel™ lyocell and linen blend with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Romper suit in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the top and crotch, and full feet with elasticated heels. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the romper suit is organic.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Straight-cut, knee-length coat in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening at the front and front pockets. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, front pockets and wide, tapered legs.
